title: Lava Beds National Monument: Management
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management       Managing Lava Beds is an effort shared by park staff and the public. This portion of the park website is to provide the public with information regarding planning and management issues at the park. To learn about firearm regulations, and other laws and policies at Lava Beds please visit our Laws & Policies page.   Completed Projects: General Management Plan - We are pleased to announce that the Lava Beds National Monument General Management Plan/Environmental Assessment is now available. For more information please visit Park Planning
